member_organisations: I work together with Institute of Chemistry of Ljubljana. They sent an offer for feasibility study of project (SGP; Solar-fuels-for traffic).
eu_initiatives:
- EU initiatives of: 
  * reducing a usage of fossil fuels 
  * reducing of CO2 emissions  
  * increasing a usage of renewable source of energy 
- UE initiatives of more clean environment / more clean emission from traffic 
- EU initiatives of energy independence from import 
- EU initiatives of accelerating domestic economy ( new jobs, investments .. )
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
I would represent all advantages / disadvantages of project (SGP; Solar fuels for traffic) to all potential partners who would be interested in researching and developing of mentioned project. 
 
I would search for all potential partners who would be interested for investing in realization of demo and commercial-scale project (SGP; Solar fuels for traffic)
goals__remit:
- A presentation of project SGP as conceptual design 
 ( project SGP means a usage of solar fuels for traffic ) 
 
- Developing the project SGP from basic conceptual design to: 
   * feasibility study 
   * pilot project 
   * demo project 
   * commercial project
